Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: criticize \criticize\ v. t. same as {criticise}; as, The paper criticized the new movie. [WordNet 1.5]

criticize v 1: find fault with; express criticism of; point out real or perceived flaws; "The paper criticized the new movie"; "Don't knock the food--it's free" [syn: {knock}, {criticise}, {pick apart}] [ant: {praise}] 2: act as a critic; "Those who criticize others often are not perfect, either" [syn: {criticise}]
